Author: kimmel (Pungo.io)#2275

Author: kimmel (Pungo.io)#2275
Content:
I have been checking Bassliner comments and pending on new proofs or  comments sor far the possibilities I see are:

1) He commented about different addresses on different devices with same seed. That is only possible doing a typo when recovering the seed. Which effectively creates 2 seeds. the ''original seed'' and the ''typo seed''. One seed always has same address in any device and since our seed is non BIP39 compatible, each seed always has only 1 address for each coin.

2) About setting a PIN and not being able to re-open the wallet using the PIN in the wallet anymore. I dont discard some kind of bug in a given device. I have tested on some devices and couldnt reproduce. Additionally, this should not happen using the web version mobile.pungo.app however will ask the team to make some tests on previous android versions, just in case
